The Nightgaunt and Rat-Thing are two supernatural creatures from the Call of Cthulhu mythos. The Nightgaunt is a tickling creature that can immobilize its victims, while the Rat-Thing is a malevolent, humanoid creature with sharp teeth and claws. Both creatures have unique abilities and characteristics, with the Nightgaunt having a 45% chance of seizing a victim and the Rat-Thing having a 30% chance of knowing spells. The Rat-Thing is also known for its ability to climb and bite its opponents, making it a formidable foe in combat.
